title: Adair–Austin Stadium
text: Adair–Austin Stadium is a sport stadium on the campus of <a href="Friends%20University">Friends University</a> in <a href="Wichita%2C%20Kansas">Wichita, Kansas</a>. The facility is primarily used by the <a href="Friends%20University%20Falcons">Friends University Falcons</a> <a href="college%20football">football</a>, <a href="soccer">soccer</a>, and <a href="track%20and%20field">track and field</a> teams. The stadium is also used for other community events.
